_json.gridTitle: The Forgotten Child: The Powerful True Story Of A Boy Abandoned As A Baby And Left To Die: The Powerful True Story Of A Boy Abandoned As A Baby And Left To Die Book By Richard Gallear, ('pf')
_json.description: Based on a true story, The Forgotten Child is a heart-breaking memoir of an abandoned newborn baby left to die, his tempestuous upbringing, and how he came through the other side.It''s a freezing winter''s night in 1954. A baby boy, a few hours old, is left by his mother, wrapped in nothing but two sheets of newspaper and hidden amongst the undergrowth by a canal bank.
